plot: Teenage Allison dreams about her future, her personal life, and her work. Is it really the future she sees in her dreams? Can she change the future that she has dreamed about?

Allison wakes up as her teenaged self, who is having dreams about her future adult life where she is married to Joe and has her three kids. Her teenaged and future lives intersect when a new boy moves in next door. He's a bit creepy and Allison tries to avoid him. In her dreams, Allison meets him again as an adult and learns that he is a registered sex offender having been convicted of raping a 14 year-old girl. When the police have a dead 13 year old on their hands, they think they know who did it. There may be something teenaged Allison can do about it however.—garykmcd
